verses.1: Mihaite in a lungsim sung uh ah, “Pasian om lo hi,” ci-in ngaihsun uh hi. Amaute sia uh a, kihhuai gamtat uh a, a hoihin a gamta kuamah om lo hi.
verses.2: A pil gamtat, Pasian a zong a om uh hiam, cih a theih nadingin Topa in vantung panin mihingte hong en suk hi.
verses.3: Amaute khempeuh a vekpi-un puk khin uh hi. A kibangin sia kim uh a, a hoihin a gamta khat zong om lo hi.
verses.4: Topaʼ tungah thu a ngen lo, annek bangin ka mite a ne tum, siatna a bawlte in thutheihna nei lo ahi hiam?
verses.5: Launa lianpi sungah amaute om ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in midikte ompih hi.
verses.6: Mizawngteʼ geelna susia nuam uh a, ahih hangin Topa pen mizawngteʼ belh ahi hi.
verses.7: Israel-te ading hotkhiatna Zion panin hong tun nading thu ka ngenngen hi. Topa in ama mite tungah nopsakna a piakkik ciangin, ama mi Israel-te kipak mahmah ding uh hi.
